title: How To Do A Vitamin C Bowel Flush | Bloom Health
author: Dr Nick Crawford
description: A Vitamin C bowel flush is a safe and effective way to identify your personal daily Vitamin C requirement. To perform a Vitamin C flush, you'll take increments of buffered Vitamin C over the course of a few hours, and record the total amount.
cleaned_text: [ ](https://bloom.health/what-is-pah-understanding-paradoxical-adipose-hyperplasia-due-to-coolsculpting/) [ What Is PAH? | Understanding Paradoxical Adipose Hyperplasia Due To CoolSculpting ](https://bloom.health/what-is-pah-understanding-paradoxical-adipose-hyperplasia-due-to-coolsculpting/) PAH usually presents as an enlarged bulge in the treatment area, and is firm or dense when compared to surrounding tissue.
